page.title: 14SCHOOL MEALS SURVEY
page.content: In our school we have recently changed our assembly hall into the dining room as well.This is because our old dining room has now been demolished.It used to be the original part of the school and was built in 1849 but now the space has been cleared so that we have a larger play area.We carried out a survey to see what people thought of the new dining room.Only 12.5% preferred the newdining area - 87.5% said they did notlike the new service. Most people did not like the new plastic trays to eat off,with separate compartments for different foods.Others complained of a lack of variety in the food and that they were more expensive under the new system.Some said we should SCRAP IT ALTOGETHER !!!! Andrea Whalley,Lesley Taylor and Claire Stanley.
